entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Snow beginning before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 16 except minus 20 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 16 except minus 20 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
